TABLE.NAME: extintmaxx
TABLE.COMMENT: Table containing the module data for instances of the External Integration for Maxx plugin.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: course the activity is attached to.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the activity instance

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when the activity was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Holds the activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Holds the format of the field

FIELD.NAME: provider
FIELD.COMMENT: Provider used for the instance.

FIELD.NAME: providercourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The external id of the course from the provider for this instance.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Max points an External Integration for Maxx instance is worth.

FIELD.NAME: referraltypeid
FIELD.COMMENT: The referral type id for the activity.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course id given by the provider in which the user is enrolled in.

FIELD.NAME: profile_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Which profile this moduleâ€™s content is taken from.

TABLE.NAME: extintmaxx_user
TABLE.COMMENT: Table containing the user information for OAuth connection using the External Integration for MaxxContent Plugin.

FIELD.NAME: provider
FIELD.COMMENT: The provider to which the user is attempting to log in using the External Integration for MaxxContent plugin.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle's user id of the student whose access credentials are stored, used for reference between Moodle's user table and Extintmaxx's user table.

FIELD.NAME: redirecturl
FIELD.COMMENT: The redirect_url for the user attempting to access courses using the External Integration for MaxxContent plugin.

FIELD.NAME: provideruserid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user within the provider's data structure.

FIELD.NAME: providercourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course id given by the provider in which the user is enrolled in.

FIELD.NAME: instanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The instance within Moodle a student's information is used for.

FIELD.NAME: currentframeid
FIELD.COMMENT: The current frame id for the stored provider course.

FIELD.NAME: previousframeid
FIELD.COMMENT: Previous frame id for the stored provider course

FIELD.NAME: nextframeid
FIELD.COMMENT: Next frame id for the stored provider course

TABLE.NAME: extintmaxx_admin
TABLE.COMMENT: Admin TABLE for External Integration for Maxx Content Plugin.

FIELD.NAME: provider
FIELD.COMMENT: Provider for the listed credentials

FIELD.NAME: providerusername
FIELD.COMMENT: Username/email field for the selected provider's API access

FIELD.NAME: providerpassword
FIELD.COMMENT: Password field for the selected provider's API access.

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: Environment url used by API calls (optional)

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name for the set of credentials

FIELD.NAME: apikey
FIELD.COMMENT: API key provided as credentials for provider's API access

FIELD.NAME: apitoken
FIELD.COMMENT: API access token returned by provider after initialization.

FIELD.NAME: remembertoken
FIELD.COMMENT: Remember Token Specific to certain services.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Shows the creation date of entry (for debugging and logging purposes).

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this entry was last modified (for debugging and logging purposes).

TABLE.COMMENT: Provided info for the accessible courses of a given provider.

FIELD.NAME: referraltypeid
FIELD.COMMENT: The referral type id for the course.

FIELD.NAME: provider
FIELD.COMMENT: Provider providing the course.

FIELD.NAME: providercourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course ID for the provided course.

FIELD.NAME: courseguid
FIELD.COMMENT: The guid for the provided course.

FIELD.NAME: providercoursename
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the provided course.

FIELD.NAME: providercoursedesc
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the provided course.

FIELD.NAME: profile_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The profile id for the provided course.

FIELD.NAME: provider_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the login information
